_sText:
deathrun_rising_beta
INFOMap made by Biohazard.pt Hey, so here is my first deathrun map. As you can see I am a very variate mapper. Went from Zombie horde, to surf, to deathrun mapper. This map is quite simple, nice layout. Took me a lot of time because I had lot of problems with compile. Enjoy.
MAP INFOType: Deathrun Players: 60vs4 - Simple layout. - Standart textures. - Two "secrets". - Three ways of killing the Terrorists. - Automatic, semi-automatic and manual traps. - Quite difficult with experient Terrorist. - HDR ligthing. - Variate ambient_generics. - CLASS CHOOSER WHEN ON TERRORIST TEAM**.
TRAP INFOLEVEL 1 1 - Exploding gas leak 2 - Disappearing bridge 3 - Spike jail 4 - Spike ramp 5 - Automatic crusher 6 - Lethal/non-lethal ramps 7 - Tunnel blade 8 - Pushing fan 9 - Exploding barrels 10 - Falling block LEVEL 2 1 - Pool drain to spikes 2 - Lightning hit 3 - Automatic rotating ramps 4 - Freeze to fall 5 - Tricky stairs 6 - Laser pool 7 - Rotating walls (with reverse rotating on click) 8 - Rotating blade 9 - Particle eater 10 - ? 11 - Shocking energy bolt
SCREENSHOT INFOScreenshot 1 - Finish zone Screenshot 2 - Spawn zone Screenshot 3 - Class chooser for Terrorists Screenshot 4 - Level 1 traps Screenshot 5 - Outside spawn zone Screenshot 6 - Level 2 traps
**CLASS CHOOSER INFO- When on Terrorist team, you can either choose to be a fast Terrorist, with enhanced speed, or you can choose to be a Terrorist with a USP. This proves to be useful when you want to avoid getting damage on trap that explode or move faster to never let any CT escape. Enjoy :)
If you want to post this map on other forums go ahead but give me credit for my own map. Thanks go to Unreal, BigBangQuint and Aurora (JJ45). Please feel free to rate, stamp or/and post some feedback.
